Detailed Description

Input driver for OIS, the input manager typically used with Ogre.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OISDriver::OISDriver ( Ogre::RenderWindow *  window,
bool  exclusive = true 
)

If exclusive=true, then we capture mouse and keyboard from the OS.

OISDriver::~OISDriver (  ) 

Member Function Documentation

void OISDriver::capture (  )  [virtual]

Captures input and produces the relevant events from it. An event callback must be set with setEvent(), or all events will be ignored.

Implements Mangle::Input::Driver.

bool OISDriver::isDown ( int  index  )  [virtual]

Check the state of a given key or button. The key/button definitions depends on the driver.

Implements Mangle::Input::Driver.
